about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a Senior Automation & QA Engineer with a strong engineering-architectural focus. I don't just write tests—I build complex automation infrastructures that actually scale. Think of me as the bridge between manual testers, Cucumber, and full automation, with a knack for turning testing into a product, not a burden.
about.paragraph2: Currently serving as Tech Lead and Technical Manager at Bank Leumi, I'm a key player in high-stakes banking projects where reliability isn't optional. I lead organizational change by introducing Cucumber to non-technical testers, improving collaboration with development teams, and delivering training that actually sticks. My approach? Stop and think about design before rushing to write code—because a smart BaseTest, dynamic timeouts, and clean OOP architecture make all the difference.
about.paragraph3: I'm always thinking ahead: how does this look in 1-2 years? How do we make automation a product, not just a regression runner? I'm exploring AI + Automation, Playwright, visual validation with Computer Vision, and React Native automation that's actually smart, not brittle. With ~3+ years of hands-on automation experience (but the mindset of someone with much more), I'm looking for impact, technical depth, and places that value infrastructure thinking over test-count metrics.

leumi.title: Head of Automation in Private Digital & Team Lead
leumi.description: Leading automation infrastructure development for critical banking systems. Managing the entire testing domain—both manual and automation—while driving organizational transformation. I bridge the gap between manual testers and automation through Cucumber, enabling non-technical team members to contribute to automated testing. I've improved collaboration with development teams, delivered engaging lectures and training sessions, and built frameworks that emphasize design-first thinking, clean OOP architecture, and scalable infrastructure. My work focuses on high-stakes systems where reliability and maintainability are non-negotiable.

skills.title: Skills & Technologies
skills.description: From mobile automation to backend APIs, from DevOps pipelines to emerging AI tools—building comprehensive automation infrastructures.

gherkinMate.title: GherkinMate
gherkinMate.description: A web-based system that bridges the gap between manual testers and automation. GherkinMate enables non-technical testers to write Cucumber scenarios that seamlessly integrate into automation frameworks. It's designed with a light, approachable interface—complete with a ready-made script in Hebrew (with Gherkin in English) that's humorous and non-intimidating. This project embodies my philosophy: automation should be a collaboration tool, not a barrier.
